sub_title: INTEGRATED MARKETING COMMUNICATIONS (FREELANCE//AVAILABLE). Delivering your marketing and communication goals. Builds, executes and optimizes 360 marketing communication programs
summary:
Integrated Marketing & Communications Specialist
Organizing, improving and executing your (digital) marketing and communications. With over 20 years of experience in digital marketing, media, and communications, I help brands to get the best out of their marketing and communication investments. Overseeing the current complex communication landscape and aligning your business and communication strategy with available tools, channels, tactics and emerging opportunities. 

Optimizing Customer Journeys
My strength lies in managing, aligning and integrating the different channels, tactics and specialties across the customer journey. Managing the customer journey with marketing and communication tactics is done with a growth hacker mindset. Based on a 360 analysis of all marketing and communication activities I review strategy and set priorities for optimization. Through experiments in every stage, I try to improve the total effect step by step.

Integrated Marketing Communications
Integrating disciplines, channels and specialties runs like a thread through my professional career. First by founding my own digital media agency in the early internet days and adding specialties like social, gaming, search and creative execution. By co-building the Dutch Isobar network (currently Dentsu) and integrating a network of digital agencies into a traditional media and communication agency. By building a digital practice group for an international corporate communications agency where I integrated digital tactics and specialties into corporate communications and PR. 

20+ years relevant working experience
Having worked in digital, media, creative and PR agencies I have built strong experience on agency side.  Working interim and freelance for the past 9 years taught me the organizational dynamics from a brand perspective. Combining the two gives me an advantage in working with agencies, or vice versa.
I know how to align channels offline and online, how to adapt creatives to channels, how to make cross overs between disciplines such as SEO link building and PR outreach or aligning brand and reputation. 
This professional experience gives me the ability to manage the complex marketing communication landscape. Connecting the dots for better results is what I love to do.

Interested in my view of a truly integrated marketing communication approach? Or want to discuss your needs in the current communication landscape? Send me a message or give me a call?

treasury_media.title: IoT payments made easy by FINN - Banking of Things
treasury_media.description: The Internet of things creates one big network of smart devices and people. By adding sensors to everyday objects we now enable communication between devices and people. FINN enables machines and smart devices to make IoT triggered payments...

treasury_media.title: SRM Goeroebijeenkomst David Wolff
treasury_media.description: Kort video verslag van SRM Guru sessie die ik gegeven heb over social media

education.field_of_study: Algemene Sociale Wetenschappen (specialised in Media Psychology)

awards.title: nomination AMMA Award - best engagement strategy - Ziggo eBattle
awards.description: received a nomination for a campaign created while working interim at Ziggo. Creating content from the Ziggo sponsorship of AFC Ajax we created the first eSports activation in the Netherlands. Around the upcoming Ajax en PSV  game we created an online qualification tournament between Ajax and PSV. 20 teams where battling live from the Amsterdam Arena and the PSV stadium in Eindhoven to secure first place. Two teams qualified to play a live game on the big screens in the Amsterdam Arena just before the actual game started

awards.title: Winner European Excellence Awards - Benelux - Marktplaats
awards.issuer: Quadriga University of Applied Sciences - Berlijn

awards.title: Nomination EMEA Digital Communication Award - data visualisation & information design - Marktplaats
awards.issuer: Quadriga University of Applied Sciences - Berlijn

awards.title: Winner EMEA Digital Communication Award - Viral communication - Marktplaats
awards.issuer: Quadriga University of Applied Sciences - Berlijn

awards.title: winner EMEA Golden SABRE Award- web based business - Marktplaats
awards.description: Won the Golden sabre award for our work with Marktplaats. In order to promote the online car business from Marktplaats we created a prediction of the 2012 dutch elections based on the number of cars available on Marktplaats. During the conversations around the election we created relevancy for a commercial message around cars and rode the heavy public conversation around the elections.

awards.title: nomination Spin Award - best online campaign - Scrabble Battle
awards.description: received a nomination for our work for Hasbro to promote the oldskool  boardgame scrabble. We build an application where we challenged Belgium and Dutch players to play an online scrabble game. In doing so we created an online competition between Belgium and Netherlands with a real life final. You could see this as an early version of wordfeud which was not there at the time of this campaign.

awards.title: nomination Spin Award - best media use - Philips Male Grooming
awards.description: Received a nomination for our work for Philips Male grooming. Part of the campaign was an online game which was promoted via social content and ads. Highlight of the campaign where cropcircles produced by us (resembling three circles of shaving heads) which where declared real by cropcircle specialists triggering an enormous online conversation

awards.title: Nomination AMMA Award - best digital (single media) strategy - Red Bull X -fighters
awards.description: We received a nomination for our work on the X -fighters camapign. In order to promote the X fighter stream and event in Spain. We integrated a live stream into Hyves. Live streaming through a social network was still early days in 2005

awards.title: Nomination AMMA Award - best digital (single media) strategy - Neckermann Shopping
awards.description: We received a nomination for our work with Neckermann shopping. Campaign contained first dynamic ad on fixed positions on three major traffic sites.

awards.title: Nomination AMMA Award - best digital (single media) strategy - Bonaparte Postshop
awards.description: We received a nomination for our work promoting Danish online fashionshop Bonaparte.

awards.title: Winner AMMA Award - best digital (single media) strategy - Christian DIOR
awards.description: Winner of first AMMA AWard for best single media strategy. We won the award for the introduction of a new fragrance DIOR Addict via an online campaign including solid research about the added effects of online channel

awards.title: Winner ID Award - lastminute.com
awards.description: Winner of first ID award issued by DQ&A for best online campaign. @breakaway won this award for the launching campaign for Lastminute.com in the Netherlands

publications.name: Whitepaper: Intentiedata als brandstof voor marketing

profile_positions.description: Transforming Business For Good. Helping businesses and brands towards a more positive future. Creating a network of experts and brands working on the same goal. Creating a net positive impact where companies giving back more than they take from society
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder // Sr. Communication Strategist

profile_positions.description: Hired to structure and build Applied Nanolayers Marketing Communications. Responsible for bringing Marketing and Communications to the next level. Translating deep tech communications into sharp messaging and positioning the company in the fast developing semiconductor industry.
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
Via Branddirections I do strategy projects & interim marketing communication assigments. My broad background and professional experience give me the ability to oversee the complex market and to align & integrate tactics across the customer journey. Some of my latest projects:


Repositioning, implementation and activation strategy We Are Live
Gap analysis marketing communications e-commerce platforms for German ecommerce player
Translating business goals into a communication framework across markets and business units for ACT commodities
Building a CRM contact flow for SHELL
Translate content strategy Mamoet from print magazine to digital
Communication planning for Global relaunch Adidas Ultraboost
Repositioning KLM Flying Blue loyalty program
B2B strategy en positioning Marktplaats Zakelijk. 
Coaching projects on digital strategy for Philips Avent and COA. 
eCommerce strategy Heron Fireworks
Digital strategy CityHub, a new type of hotel in Amsterdam aimed at millenials.
Digital strategy for complete brand portfolio Vemedia

Skillset: Positioning, Brand Identities, translating business goals into communication goals, KPI and target setting, reporting and measurement frameworks, data, insights & analytics, Strategy development, Account planning, communication planning, Online campaigns, social media strategy, community management, influencer programs (organic), content strategy, content production (animations, whitepapers, video, blogs, presentations, infographics, sales materials), search engine ads (SEA), search engine optimization (SEO), visual search optimization, sponsorship content, email marketing, marketing automation, CRM, campaign development, creative development, format development (content), UX analysis, CX optimization, website development, CRO, e-sports and gaming, message building, PR, content outreach, conversation management, customer journey analysis, growth hacking, agile, scrum.
profile_positions.title: Integrated (Digital) Marketing, Strategy & Communications (Freelance // Interim)

profile_positions.description:
Working as a marketing and communication specialist for ING's corporate start-up FINN - Banking of Things. Working in a start-up environment to market a payment toolkit for Internet of Things. Marketing an innovative horizon 3 product to developers, companies and potential partners.

Managing a community of developers via meetups and slack to test the product and improve it. Creating (potential) business cases and making them visible to a broad relevant audience. Responsible for all (digital) marketing, sales materials, tradeshows and PR. Continuous lead generation via website and email campaigns. Created speaking opportunities and coverage via research from Forrester.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communications Manager

profile_positions.description: In a disrupted landscape I helped Dutch luxury lighting design company Brand van Egmond to position them in the right way. Where prior sales were mainly generated through lighting shops and showrooms there was a need to become better visible on the internet to drive sales. I have implemented a visual search strategy and helped them in creating a better website and set-up an advertsiing strategy. In a high luxury segment there is a big challenge in advertising because when overdue or in the wrong context you loose the interest of your exclusive target audience.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: As a content strategist for domains Music and Sport I helped to build the branded content hub for Ziggo. After creating an overall strategy first, we builded the different strategies for the different pillars. With the sponsorship of Ajax and the Ziggo Dome plenty of opportunities of high level content partnerships have been executed. Resulting in co-productions with music labels to promote albums and concerts. Such as a mini documentary for Rico, Sticks and Typhoon and an exclusive showcase for 100 ziggo clients with Sting. But also the sponsorship with Ajax created high quality content with one of the highlights the first virtual Ajax - PSV live FIFA battle in a full Johan Cruijff Arena. Also created the foundation for eSports activities and sponsorships from Ziggo
profile_positions.title: Content Strategist Music and Sports

profile_positions.description: I was hired to do an audit on existing global digital strategy of Bugaboo. A three months assignment to come up with improvements and recommendations. An extensive inhouse project with interviews, data analysis and lots of informal conversations resulted in a roadmap to improve strategy across different pillars in the company.
profile_positions.title: Digital Strategy Consultant Bugaboo

profile_positions.description: Worked as client lead KPN for The Online Company and responsible for all digital campaigns of KPN. Creating Digital strategies for campaigns and overseeing execution. Evaluating with client and being part of alignment team of Mindshare, N=5, KPN and The Online Company.
profile_positions.title: Client lead KPN - The Online Company

profile_positions.description:
At Corporate communication agency Fleishman Hillard I was specifically asked to build a digital practice group. By hiring and managing this team of 5 digital specialists I put Fleishman Hillard on the map as a digital player in the changing PR landscape. Together with my team, I have won multiple international prices such as Silver and Gold SABRE Awards,  European excellence Awards and EMEA Digital Communication Awards and brought in several new clients based on our digital profile. Besides coaching and managing the digital team I was also responsible for digital knowledge transfer to other co-consultants, for product development, integrated strategy, account planning and measurement. Special achievement: Under my supervision of the digital department, Fleishman Hillard became one of the first PR agencies that stepped away from advertising value as a metric and brought alternative measurement approaches based on outcomes. 

Keywords: measurement plans & dashboards, account planning, campaign development, content strategy and production, digital & social strategy, messaging development, communication architecture, influencer & stakeholder analysis, integrated communications, reputatie management, storytelling, social crisis preparedness 

 Clients: Philips, Prorail, Marktplaats, Curaçao tourist board, TMG, Kinderombudsman,
profile_positions.title: Head of Digital

profile_positions.description:
I was one of the first people hired for building the Dutch Isobar Network, a network of digital agencies. My role was to give strategic  advice in transiting a ’traditional’ media agency to a network of digital agencies. As a strategy director I was mainly responsible for overall digital strategy across the different companies of Isobar. Positioning Isobar as a full service agency and linking the different specialities of the companies in integrated digital communications planning. Within the Dutch Isobar network I worked for and with Checkit (search), Bookmark (eCRM), Marvellous (mobile), De-Construct (creative), Clay Amsterdam (creative), Human Media (Social Media), Bureau DR (digital direct response) Carat & Vizeum interactive (online media). Besides Strategy director, I was also member of the management team at Isobar.

Keywords: analytics, reporting & dashboards, integrated digital strategy, social strategy, community management, search, lead generation, conversion rate optimalisation, mobile development, account planning, campaign development . ingame advertising.

 Clients: Philips, Mattel, General Motors, Grolsch, Heinz, Pearl, Activision
profile_positions.title: Strategy Director Digital
